about.title: About Yangfinity
about.heading: üöÄ About Yangfinity
about.p1: Yangfinity is dedicated to providing Metin2 players with the fastest, most reliable Yang and Won delivery for Gameforge (West, East, TR), Private, and Mobile servers. Our mission is to empower players by making in-game currency accessible, affordable, and secure.
about.p2: We support popular servers such as Eostre, Teutonia, Germania, Europe, Tigerghost, Ruby Chimera, Emerald Aurora, Iberia, Italy, Azrael, Onyx Obsidian, Willow, Ruby Kirin, Cesko, Magyarorszag, Polska, Romania, Tara Romanesca, Greece, Arabia, Zephyr, Ruby Lucifer, Onyx Bazalt, Emerald Alesta, Ruby Charon, Anadolu, Arkadaslar, Bagjanamu, Barbaros, Dandanakan, Ezel, Alturi2, Elveron, Kerion, NewMt2, Solis2, Rubinum Saphirus, Merlis, Lucerna Laetus, Levia, Celestial World, Notorius2, Pegasus2, Fortis2, Helios2, M2Classic, Shiva, Azyrah, Rubinum, Zenit, Royale, Mobile2 Tuva, Mobile2 Tramola, Mobile2 Alesta and more. Our team is passionate about Metin2 and committed to excellent customer service.
about.p3: Whether you're a new player or a seasoned veteran, Yangfinity is your trusted partner for all your Yang and Won needs. ü§ù Join our community and experience the difference!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yangfinity is a service that provides fast and secure Yang and Won (in-game currency) delivery for Metin2 Gameforge, Private, and Mobile servers.
faq.a2: We support Gameforge (West, East, TR), Private, and Mobile servers. Main supported servers include: Eostre, Teutonia, Germania, Europe, Tigerghost, Ruby Chimera, Emerald Aurora, Iberia, Italy, Azrael, Onyx Obsidian, Willow, Ruby Kirin, Cesko, Magyarorszag, Polska, Romania, Tara Romanesca, Greece, Arabia, Zephyr, Ruby Lucifer, Onyx Bazalt, Emerald Alesta, Ruby Charon, Anadolu, Arkadaslar, Bagjanamu, Barbaros, Dandanakan, Ezel, Alturi2, Elveron, Kerion, NewMt2, Solis2, Rubinum Saphirus, Merlis, Lucerna Laetus, Levia, Celestial World, Notorius2, Pegasus2, Fortis2, Helios2, M2Classic, Shiva, Azyrah, Rubinum, Zenit, Royale, Mobile2 Tuva, Mobile2 Tramola, Mobile2 Alesta and more.
faq.q3: How fast is the Yang & Won delivery?
faq.a3: Most orders are delivered within minutes. Delivery times may vary depending on server status and order volume.
faq.a4: We prioritize your safety and privacy. Our methods are designed to minimize risk, but please be aware that buying in-game currency may violate some server rules. Proceed at your own discretion.
faq.a5: You can reach out to our support team via the contact form on our website or through our social media channels.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Yangfinity. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.li1: All sales are final unless otherwise stated in our Refund Policy.
terms.li2: Users must provide accurate information for order fulfillment.
terms.li3: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
terms.li4: Use of our service is at your own risk. We are not responsible for any losses incurred.
terms.li5: These terms may be updated at any time without prior notice.
terms.contact: For questions regarding these terms, please contact us via the Contact page.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: At Yangfinity, customer satisfaction is our priority. Please review our refund policy below:
refund.li1: Refunds are only issued if we are unable to deliver your order within the promised timeframe.
refund.li2: Refund requests must be made within 24 hours of purchase.
refund.li3: Refunds will not be issued for completed and delivered orders.
refund.li4: To request a refund, please contact our support team with your order details.
refund.contact: For further questions, please reach out via the Contact page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Have a question or need support? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
